name: HTML5 Swiffy Insert
author: Yuanga

sections.description: HTML5 Swiffy Insert is a simple plugin that lets you to use a shortcode to insert HTML5 animations generated with Google Swiffy. Swiffy converts Flash SWF files to HTML5, allowing you to reuse Flash content on devices without a Flash player (such as iPhones and iPads).
sections.installation:
• Upload “html5-swiffy-insert.php.php” to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  • View extensions > HTML5 Swiffy Insert for a three steps guide.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Updated Swiffy Runtime JS

1.1

  • Insert swiffy animations in your posts too!
  • Fixed some writing errors
  • Improves explanation

1.0

  • Launched the first version

short_description: HTML5 Swiffy Insert lets you to insert HTML5 animations generated with Google Swiffy.
description: HTML5 Swiffy Insert is a simple plugin that lets you to use a shortcode to insert HTML5 animations generated with Google Swiffy. Swiffy converts Flash SWF files to HTML5, allowing you to reuse Flash content on devices without a Flash player (such as iPhones and iPads).
